description: Detects cases in which a file gets renamed to .dll, which often happens to bypass perimeter protection
author: frack113
name: Rename Common File to DLL File
query: (file.path.text:*.dll AND (NOT ((((SourceFilename:(*.dll OR *.tmp)) OR (SourceFilename:(*.dll.* OR *\\SquirrelTemp\\temp*)))) OR ((SourceFilename:"")) OR ((NOT _exists_:SourceFilename)) OR ((process.executable.text:C\:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\* AND process.executable.text:*\\TiWorker.exe)) OR (((process.executable.text:"C:\Windows\System32\wuauclt.exe") OR (file.path.text:C\:\\$WINDOWS.\~BT\\Sources\\*))) OR ((process.executable.text:(C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\\*))))))
